summary: Provides a LayerPropertyFlow class that encapsulates all configuration options for the MODFLOW LPF (Layer‑Property Flow) package, including hydraulic conductivities, anisotropy, interblock transmissivity methods, layer types, storage coefficients, wetting controls, and budget‑saving flags, together with validation and Jinja2‑based rendering of the required MODFLOW input files.
business_intent: Enable modelers to programmatically define, validate, and generate LPF package data for groundwater flow simulations, reducing manual errors and streamlining integration with MODFLOW workflows.
